actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from 50 percent to 30 percent the degree of service-connected disability a veteran must have in order to be eligible for non-service-connected outpatient care from the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Reduces from 50 to 30 percent the degree of service-connected disability a veteran must have to be eligible for non-service- connected outpatient care from the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to reduce from 50 percent to 30 percent the degree of service-connected disability a veteran must have in order to be eligible for non-service-connected outpatient care from the Veterans' Administration.
